personas.title: Data Engineer

hero.alt: Data engineer writing a Delta table with dc43 enforcement

images.alt: Databricks adapter snippet inside a notebook

personas.story: Bind a data product to a contract, add the Databricks adapter and call `write_with_governance(...)` in your DLT pipeline. Incompatible writes are blocked in staging, which reduces incidents.

personas.title: Data Steward

hero.alt: Steward reviewing metrics history for a contract

images.alt: Metrics history chart for a governed dataset

personas.story: Stewards review runtime metrics at the dataset level and publish new contract versions with evidence-backed decisions.

personas.title: Product Owner

hero.alt: Product catalog entry showing contract metadata

personas.story: Publish contract metadata into your catalog so consumers can see SLAs, owners and compatibility. This increases adoption and reduces confusion.
